title: New Client Bugs and I get leaverbuster, AGAIN
body:
I love the new client, visually it's stunning, I love the new options it brings and I'm excited to see how it develops.
BUT FOR THE LOVE OF GOD CAN I STOP BEING PUNISHED EVERY TIME THE DAMN THINGS DECIDES TO FREEZE IN CHAMP SELECT OR TO NEVER LAUNCH THE GAME ONCE CHAMP SELECT ENDS.

I was forced to restart the client and log into the old one in order to connect to an Ascension game I queued for this morning. Champ select ended and the game never launched. I reconnect just fine using the old client but once the game ended I'm told that I'll have a 20 minute leaverbuster for 5 games because I dodged......WHAT?

Send help pls.

replies.body:
I'm not aware of any specific issues with the Beta Client that would cause you to not load into a match. We typically see this happen if there's a poor connection to our servers, so I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to eliminate that possibility.

Unfortunately, we are unable to remove the Leaverbuster penalties on your account, but if you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps, let me know.

Yep. Riot dropped the ball on the new client and released it way too early. It is insanely buggy still and I have lost so much LP because of it.

My favorite is when it freezes during champ select so I can't pick a champ and it unfeezes just after my timer is up.
